    • Method Detail

      • loadCube

        public void loadCube(int size)
        Calls the necessary methods to load a certain size of cube.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of cube to be loaded.

      • menu

        public void menu()
        Calls the necessary methods to load the menu.

      • scramble

        public void scramble()
        Randomly rotates the layers of the current cube 1000 times to mix it up and start the puzzle.

      • solve

        public void solve()
        Creates a new RubiksCube of the current size to produce a solved cube.

      • deselect

        public void deselect()
        Calls the CubePanel's deselect method.

      • findSelected

        public int[] findSelected()
        Calls the CubePanel's findSelected method.
        Returns:
        The currently selected button's ID.

      • rotateLayer

        public void rotateLayer(int direction,
                        int layer,
                        int amount)
        Calls the necessary methods to rotate a specified layer of the current cube.
        Parameters:
        direction - Which direction will be turned (0 = FSB, 1 = UED, 2 = LMR).
        layer - How deep the layer to be turned is.
        amount - How many times to turn the layer.

      • rotateCube

        public void rotateCube(int direction,
                       int amount)
        Calls the necessary methods to rotate the entirety of the current cube.
        Parameters:
        direction - Which direction will be turned (0 = FSB, 1 = UED, 2 = LMR).
        amount - How many times to turn the cube.

      • updateCube

        public void updateCube(java.lang.String time,
                       java.lang.String timePB,
                       java.lang.String moves,
                       java.lang.String movesPB,
                       int deciseconds,
                       int seconds,
                       int minutes,
                       int hours,
                       int moveCount,
                       boolean gameStart)
        Updates the RubiksCube's internal data.
        Parameters:
        time - The current time of the solve.
        timePB - The best solve time.
        moves - The current amount of moves of the solve.
        movesPB - The lowest amount of moves used to solve the cube.
        deciseconds - The current deciseconds of the cubes solve.
        seconds - The current seconds of the cubes solve.
        minutes - The current minutes of the cubes solve.
        hours - The current hours of the cubes solve.
        moveCount - The current amount of moves of the cubes solve.
        gameStart - Whether or not the solve has been started.

      • updateInfoPanel

        public void updateInfoPanel()
        Retrieves the cubes info and passes it to the CubeInfoPanel.

        Calls the RubiksFrame's victory method.
